text:
Alright～!
Now smile, turn your knee inwards a bit... perfect!

Fuu...
S-Somehow  I got through it～...

Kogane, are you alright?
It's pretty hard to get in jsut the right pose for photos, huh...
Yeah～, compared to just wearin' pretty clothes and smilin' for the camera...

A real photo shoot is tough work～
These heels are way tall, too.
But, I'm an idol an' all, right!

I'm gonna try my best to get more flexible an' train my body
so that I can pull off any pose I need to...!

Haha, that's reassuring... but your knees are shaking.
Would you like to take a seat over here for a bit?

Nfufu... Thanks
Ya see right through me, don't ya Producer.
